title: Textile, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, paper
Technique: silk threads glued on parchment or paper using wax
description: Mock embroidery. Pained facecs and members on silk. Know workshops: Tlariana Elmo (Naples). Prints were used as a model.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: silk, paper
Technique: silk threads glued on parchment or paper using wax. Bequest of Katherine Strong Welman. 1908-23-68.
